business.headline: Wall Street slips, snapping 9-day rally as oil prices hit 4-year lowWall Street's nine-day winning streak ended Monday as oil prices fell to a four-year low following an OPEC+ output boost. Tech stocks and Buffett's exit also weighed on markets.

ITR filing 2025: Forms 1 to 5 notified, which one should you use?ITR-1, or Sahaj, is for resident individuals whose total income is not more than Rs 50 lakh. If your income is from a salary or pension, one house property, bank deposit interest, or agricultural income not more than Rs 5,000, then this form is suitable for you.

Samsung challenges $520 million tax notice in India: ReportThe case revolves around how the company imported telecom equipment between 2018 and 2021. According to tax officials, Samsung mislabelled these imports to pay lower customs duties of 10–20%, which has now triggered a hefty penalty.

'Making broke adults': Redditor's viral post shreds MBA salary dreamsA viral Reddit post lists some real offers seen on LinkedIn and compares the shiny package (CTC or cost-to-company) with the actual in-hand salary after taxes and deductions.

Job change and no EPF transfer? You might be losing 8.25% interest earningsWhen you switch jobs, your Universal Account Number (UAN) stays the same, but your EPF account with your old employer doesn't automatically move to the new one. You have to transfer it yourself through the EPFO Member Sewa portal.

Escalation in tensions with India would weigh on Pakistan's growth: Moody'sGlobal rating agency Moody's said on Monday that a sustained escalation in tensions with India would likely weigh on Pakistan's growth.

Sensex ends 294 points higher, Nifty above 24,460; Adani Enterprises jumps 7%The BSE Sensex climbed 294.85 points, or 0.37%, to close at 80,796.84, while the NSE Nifty50 advanced 114.45 points, or 0.47%, to settle at 24,461.15.

Finance Minister discusses economic issues with ADB chief, no mention of PakNirmala Sitharaman met ADB President Masato Kanda at the ADB annual meeting in Manila and also held discussions with the Finance Minister of Italy, Giancarlo Giorgetti.

ITR filing 2025: Key tax benefits under Section 80C, 80D, and 24BIn case you are opting for the old tax regime, under Section 80C you can claim up to Rs 1.5 lakh of deductions every year. This section covers several popular options, like Public Provident Fund (PPF), Employees' Provident Fund (EPF), ELSS mutual fund, 5-year fixed deposits and premiums for life insurance, etc.
Explained: Why Swiggy share price jumped 6% todaySwiggy's stock may have surged nearly 6% today, but it's still down 40% year-to-date.

'To save crores in taxes': Investment banker on why rich are buying farmhousesIn India, any income from farming is completely tax-free. That means if someone says they earned money by selling vegetables, fruits, or milk from their farmland, they don't have to pay income tax on it.

Ather Energy IPO to list tomorrow. Check allotment status, latest GMPAther Energy's IPO, which ran from April 28 to April 30, involved a mix of fresh equity worth Rs 2,626 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.1 crore shares.

entertainment.headline: Kiara Advani caresses baby bump in black Gaurav Gupta ensembleMother-to-be Kiara Advani made a stunning debut at the Met Gala as she flaunted her baby bump on the blue carpet. The actor wore an ensemble by Indian designer Gaurav Gupta.

Met Gala 2025: Nick Jonas adjusting Priyanka Chopra's gown is pure husband goalsPriyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas return to the Met Gala 2025 with their amazing outfits while following this year's theme, 'Superfine: Tailoring Black Style'. One of the viral moments featured Nick helping his wife fix her gown at the event.

Rihanna pregnant with third child, debuts baby bump at Met Gala 2025Rihanna revealed her third pregnancy at the 2025 Met Gala, dazzling fans with a baby bump reveal. She and A$AP Rocky continue to charm the world with their growing family.

Shah Rukh Khan strikes iconic pose at MET Gala 2025, proves he's here to ruleShah Rukh Khan's Met Gala debut was one of the highly anticipated appearances. Amid much craze and fanfare, the superstar stunned all with his signature pose at the annual fashion event.

Netflix star Millena Brandão dies at 11 after mysterious illness in BrazilMillena Brandão, 11-year-old actress from Netflix's Sintonia, died after a mysterious illness and multiple cardiac arrests. Her condition rapidly worsened after early symptoms were misdiagnosed as dengue.

Thunderbolts twist revealed: Marvel confirms team is the New AvengersMarvel reveals Thunderbolts' secret identity as the New Avengers just days after release, surprising fans. The post-credits twist echoes comic lore and reshapes the MCU's future lineup.

NYC Met Gala 2025: What streets are closed on May 5?The Met Gala 2025 will cause traffic delays in Manhattan's Upper East Side on May 5 due to road closures near the Met Museum. Red carpet arrivals are scheduled to begin at 5:30 p.m.

Mohanlal's Thudarum falls prey to piracy, producer Renjith takes legal actionA video showing Mohanlal's 'Thudarum' being played illegally on a tourist bus, while the film is still in theatres, has gone viral. It prompted producer Renjith to file a cyber complaint.

Kamal Haasan's Thug Life to stream on Netflix after theatrical releaseKamal Haasan's 'Thug Life', directed by Mani Ratnam, will be released in theatres on June 5, 2025. It will later stream on Netflix. The film features a star-studded cast and marks the duo's reunion after 'Nayakan'.

One man, many universes: Ajay Devgn and the rise of Bollywood's franchise heroActor Ajay Devgn has achieved stardom by playing different roles in multiple film franchises across genres. With many sequels in the pipeline, he has become the industry's top (and most sought-after) franchise hero.

HIT 3 box office: Nani's third film to cross Rs 100-crore markWith 'HIT 3', Nani continues his winning streak at the box office, delivering yet another blockbuster. The film has not only grossed over Rs 100 crore worldwide in just four days but also marked his third consecutive $2 million success in North America.

Met Gala 2025: Date, time, theme, guest list, and where to watchThe Met Gala is almost here. The event, which will be taking place on May 5 in New York City, can be watched by Indians via live stream. Wondering when, where and how to watch it? Read on to know.

Ayushmann Khurrana, Rashmika Mandanna shoot final leg of Thama in Ooty: ReportThe shoot of the highly-anticipated Ayushmann Khurrana and Rashmika Mandanna starrer 'Thama' has reached its final phase. Portions of the climax are reportedly being shot in Ooty currently.

Suits LA Episode 11 review: Legal drama turns legal mess - case of identity crisisReleased-Mon May 05, 2025Who even asked for so many individual stories and flashbacks to begin with? Where is this show heading now? 'Suits LA' just premiered its worst episode so far, and we are sure it's losing the plot fast.

Allu Arjun to be seen in rugged, powerful role in Atlee film | ExclusiveAllu Arjun is collaborating with Atlee for a sci-fi action film, announced on his birthday. The film, produced by Sun Pictures, promises a unique look for Allu Arjun and is set for a grand release.

Diljit Dosanjh's Met Gala moment goes beyond just a red carpet appearanceDiljit Dosanjh is set to make history as the only Indian actor to have a seat at this year's Met Gala 2025 soiree, representing India in a regal ensemble by Prabal Gurung alongside international stars.

Suriya on comparisons with brother Karthi: I can't be him, can't do MeiyazhaganSuriya shared his take on comparisons drawn by fans between him and his brother Karthi, during a conversation to promote his latest film, 'Retro'.

Lady Gaga's Brazil concert sees 2.5 million attendees, highest by a female artistLady Gaga made history with her performance at Copacabana Beach, attracting a record-breaking crowd and marking her return to Brazil after 12 years. The concert was not only a musical spectacle but also a cultural celebration, highlighting her connection with fans and the LGBTQ+ community.

Tell me who's at fault: Sonu Nigam responds to case over Bengaluru concert remarksPlayback singer Sonu Nigam issued a clarification after a case was registered against him for his 'provocative' remarks in Bengaluru. The singer claimed that he was threatened by a group of boys to sing in Kannada.

general news.headline: Pak's anti-India rant at UN Security Council fizzles out, meet yields no outcomeThe UNSC meeting requested by Pakistan ended without resolution amid rising India-Pakistan tensions following the deadly Pahalgam attack. Secretary-General Guterres warned against military escalation and urged restraint on both sides.

Air raid sirens, evacuation advised as Centre orders drills on May 7The government has asked several states to conduct drills for effective civil defence on May 7 (Wednesday) amid rising tensions between India and Pakistan over the April 22 Pahalgam terror attack.

Trump-Harvard showdown heats up with freeze on future research grantsThe White House has informed Harvard University it will receive no new federal research grants unless it complies with government demands, escalating a standoff over funding, governance, and academic freedom.

Would you support Pak if it fights India, asks Islamabad cleric, gets no replyMaulana Abdul Aziz Ghazi, a controversial cleric of Islamabad's Lal Masjid, witnessed no people raising their hands when he asked the people whether they would support Pakistan in the event of a war with India.
Shah Rukh Khan in black suit, heavy jewels makes a stylish Met Gala debutShah Rukh Khan made his Met Gala debut in an all-black ensemble styled with an assemblage of statement jewellery pieces.

Video: Israel bombs Yemen's Hodeidah port day after Houthis strike Tel AvivIn a sharp escalation, Israel, in coordination with the US, launched airstrikes on Yemen's Hodeidah port, a day after a missile fired by Iran-backed Houthi rebels struck near Tel Aviv's Ben Gurion Airport.

Diljit Dosanjh brings dandy royalty to life in Maharaja Bhupinder Singh-inspired lookDiljit Dosanjh arrived at the Met Gala exuding royalty in an all-ivory ensemble, featuring a cape embroidered with a map of Punjab and the Punjabi alphabet (Gurmukhi).

Top court puts judges' assets, appointment details in public in transparency pushThe move comes in the wake of growing concerns over opacity in the judiciary, especially after a controversy surrounding the alleged discovery of burnt wads of cash at the residence of Delhi High Court judge Yashwant Varma following a fire incident.

Kiara Advani's Met Gala debut outfit by Gaurav Gupta is an ode to motherhoodKiara Advani made her Met Gala debut in a monochrome gown by Indian designer Gaurav Gupta. The outfit, featuring a metallic breastplate, was an ode to motherhood.

Amazon India's Great Summer Sale 2025 is here: Transform your garden with upto 60% off on lawn & garden essentialsMake your Garden and Lawn summer ready with Amazon India's Great Summer Sale 2025 that is live now. Enjoy Up to 60% off on Lawn & Garden Essentials such as Plants, Solar Lights and more.

DRDO, Indian Navy conduct combat firing of indigenous multi-influence ground mineThe indigenous Multi-Influence Ground Mine, an advanced underwater naval mine, was developed by the Naval Science & Technological Laboratory in Visakhapatnam.

Military strike from India any moment along LoC: Pak defence ministerPakistan's Defence Minister Khawaja Asif said that there are reports that India could carry out a military strike at any moment along the Line of Control in Kashmir.

Met Gala 2025: Nick Jonas adjusting Priyanka Chopra's gown is pure husband goalsPriyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas return to the Met Gala 2025 with their amazing outfits while following this year's theme, 'Superfine: Tailoring Black Style'. One of the viral moments featured Nick helping his wife fix her gown at the event.

Maldives President Muizzu breaks world record with 15-hour press conferenceMaldives President Mohamed Muizzu set a world record with a nearly 15-hour press conference, answering public questions. He also softened his stance on India agreements, sparking criticism from the opposition.

Two terror associates arrested with arms, grenade at checkpoint in J&K's BudgamIn the wake of the April 22 terror attack in which 26 people, mostly tourists, were killed by terrorists in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam, security forces in the union territory have heightened security and intensified counter-terrorism operations across the region.

Met Gala 2025 LIVE: Golden Girl Gigi Hadid, Boss Lady Zendaya dress to impressMet Gala live updates: The Met Gala 2025 has arrived, celebrating Black Dandyism with bold fashion and powerful statements. The highlights of the events will include Shah Rukh Khan's debut and stunning looks from global stars, all under the theme Superfine: Tailoring Black Style.

Sacred wood stolen for Digha temple? Mamata dives into Jagannath Dham politicsWest Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee has junked the allegations that sacred wood from the Nabakalebara ritual in Puri Jagannath Temple was used to craft the idols at the recently inaugurated Digha temple. Puri temple authorities are questioning a senior servitor on the issue. Mamata's remarks that Bengal has "neem wood" and doesn't need to steal comes amid a heated debate over the Digha temple, named Jagannath Dham.

Rain drowns SRH's playoff hopes as Delhi Capitals escape with a pointIPL 2025: Pat Cummins' spirited leadership and SRH's best bowling display went in vain as rain played spoilsport in Hyderabad. The last year's finalists were knocked out of the playoffs race while Delhi Capitals were lucky to head home with a point.

Trump's $1,000 offer to migrants who self-deport in fresh mass deportation pushThe Trump administration has launched a program offering $1,000 and travel aid to migrants who self-deport, calling it a safer and cheaper alternative to forced removal. So far, Trump has deported 152,000, fewer than under Biden's previous term.

How third Sikh Guru Amardas opposed social evils and urged Akbar to revoke JizyaThe third Guru of the Sikhs, Amar Das Ji, set himself against the customs and restraints which bind the people of his age. He caused the langar to be known in many places and spoke earnestly against the practices of sati and the keeping of purdah. In a meeting most uncommon, he made a request to the Mughal Emperor, Akbar, that the Jizya, a tax burdening the Hindus, be taken away.

IPL playoffs race explained: RCB in pole position as 7 teams in top 4 battleIPL 2025: Seven teams are in the race for four spots in the playoffs. While former champions CSK, SRH and RR are out of the race, RCB are in pole position as they look to finish in the top two for the first time since 2016.

Pakistan violates LoC ceasefire for 12th day, Army retaliatesIndian Army responded to unprovoked small-arms firing from the Pakistani Army across the Line of Control (LoC) during the night of May 5-6, Indian Army spokesperson said.

Parliamentary panel seeks action against 'anti-national' influencers, platformsAmid heightened tensions following the Pahalgam terror attack, a parliamentary panel has directed the I&B and MeitY ministries to detail planned actions against social media platforms and influencers allegedly acting against national interests.

Praveen Sood may get 1-year extension after no consensus on CBI chief's successorThe government is likely to extend the tenure of Praveen Sood by a year after a high-level selection committee chaired did not reach a consensus on the CBI Director's selector.

sports.headline: DC needs to get their act together or else face the familiar IPL blackhole againDelhi Capitals appear to be facing a familiar situation that has plagued them in the past as their once promising IPL 2025 campaign seems to be hitting a roadblock. Can the Capitals save their campaign before it is too late?

Nearly fell off chair seeing Karun Nair open: Shane Watson slams DC tacticsShane Watson slammed Delhi Capitals for disrupting their batting order, calling out the management's unnecessary changes after Karun Nair's promotion backfired in their crucial IPL 2025 clash against Sunrisers Hyderabad.

IPL playoffs race explained: RCB in pole position as 7 teams in top 4 battleIPL 2025: Seven teams are in the race for four spots in the playoffs. While former champions CSK, SRH and RR are out of the race, RCB are in pole position as they look to finish in the top two for the first time since 2016.

What makes Shubman Gill-Sudharsan a hit jodi in IPL 2025? GT director explainsIPL 2025, MI vs GT: Speaking to the press on the eve of the big-ticket contest in Mumbai, Gujarat Titans Director of Cricket Vikram Solanki heaped praise on the opening partnership between Sai Sudharsan and Shubman Gill. He also spoke about Kagiso Rabada's return from a doping ban.

Rain drowns SRH's playoff hopes as Delhi Capitals escape with a pointIPL 2025: Pat Cummins' spirited leadership and SRH's best bowling display went in vain as rain played spoilsport in Hyderabad. The last year's finalists were knocked out of the playoffs race while Delhi Capitals were lucky to head home with a point.

Jasprit Bumrah gives a completely different dimension to MI's attack: JayawardeneMI coach Mahela Jayawardene has heaped praise on Jasprit Bumrah and said that the pacer has given the team a completely different dimension since making his return to the side. Bumrah, after a slow start, has found his groove and leading the MI attack from the front.

Indian physical disability cricket team completes 5-0 sweep of Sri LankaThe Indian disability cricket team achieved a clean sweep over Sri Lanka in the PD Deepaka Lohia Memorial Trophy. This victory highlights the growing importance of inclusivity in sports across South Asia.

Watch: Rohit Sharma presents Mohammed Siraj his T20 World Cup champions ringRohit Sharma presented Mohammed Siraj with his T20 World Cup champions ring ahead of the MI vs GT clash on Monday, May 5. Siraj was part of the team that won the T20 World Cup last year.

Watch: Jannik Sinner gets hero's welcome in Rome ahead of return from doping banItalian Open 2025: World No. 1 Jannik Sinner was greeted by hundreds of fans as he trained in Rome ahead of the Italian Open, his first competitive tournament since the end of his doping ban on Monday.

Mohun Bagan handed player registration ban due to technical errorMohun Bagan Super Giant face a player registration ban after a technical discrepancy in FIFA's system flagged an unsettled compensation linked to Jason Cummings' transfer. The club have since taken swift action to resolve the matter.

Harry Kane elated with first career title triumph as Bayern Munich win BundesligaHarry Kane expressed his happiness at winning the Bundesliga title, the first trophy of his career. Kane played a big role in Bayern's title win this season as they won with two games remaining.

Harry Kane elated with first career title triumph as Bayern Munich win BundesligaHarry Kane expressed his happiness at winning the Bundesliga title, the first trophy of his career. Kane played a big role in Bayern's title win this season as they won with two games remaining.

Rabada won't let doping row distract him or Gujarat Titans: Vikram SolankiIPL 2025: Vikram Solanki backed Kagiso Rabada's return from suspension, praising the pacer's maturity and transparency, while insisting that the Gujarat Titans would stay focused as they chase a crucial playoff spot.

Big guns KL Rahul, Axar Patel fail as Delhi crumble under pressure in HyderabadIPL 2025: Delhi Capitals lost five wickets inside the first 8 overs of their contest in Hyderabad on Monday. Captain Pat Cummins came up with an inspired spell with the new ball for the SunRisers as KL Rahul and Axar Patel failed in the crunch game.

SRH drop Mohammed Shami and Nitish Kumar Reddy for crucial DC clashSunrisers Hyderabad made high-stakes calls by axing Mohammed Shami and Nitish Kumar Reddy for their crunch IPL 2025 encounter against Delhi Capitals, signalling a shift in approach as the playoff race tightens.

SRH v DC: T Natarajan makes debut for Delhi Capitals, Mukesh Kumar droppedT Natarajan makes his much-anticipated debut for Delhi Capitals in IPL 2025. The left-arm pacer, who was bought for Rs 10.75 crore, is back after a lengthy injury layoff.

Rohit Sharma has been managing a niggle since Champions Trophy: MI coach JayawardeneMumbai Indians coach Mahela Jayawardene has claimed that Rohit Sharma has been managing a niggle since India's Champions Trophy campaign. Rohit has been mostly used as an impact player during IPL 2025.

Mohammed Shami on injury recovery, quiet IPL 2025: Focused on giving my bestMohammed Shami said he has moved past his injury struggles and is fully focused on delivering for Sunrisers Hyderabad, as they chase a crucial playoff spot in the final stretch of IPL 2025.

IPL 2025: India pacer Mohammed Shami receives death threat on emailMohammed Shami has received a death threat via email, his brother revealed to India Today on Monday, May 5. Shami received the message on Sunday and probe into the matter has already begun.

Rohit Sharma has been managing a niggle since Champions Trophy: MI coach JayawardeneMumbai Indians coach Mahela Jayawardene has claimed that Rohit Sharma has been managing a niggle since India's Champions Trophy campaign. Rohit has been mostly used as an impact player during IPL 2025.

IPL 2025: India pacer Mohammed Shami receives death threat on emailMohammed Shami has received a death threat via email, his brother revealed to India Today on Monday, May 5. Shami received the message on Sunday and probe into the matter has already begun.

Pant not enjoying cricket, under price and captaincy pressure: Adam GilchristLegendary Australia wicketkepeer batter Adam Gilchrist feels Rishabh Pant isn't being seen at his jovial best in the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025), and is missing the spark.

IPL 2025: GT pacer Kagiso Rabada's ban over, can resume playing immediatelyKagiso Rabada's ban for a failed drug test is over and he can immediately resume playing. Rabada is expected to make his return for GT in the coming days in IPL.

LSG showed desperation to get Mayank Yadav back, he's not ready yet: Ambati RayuduFormer India cricketer turned commentator Ambati Rayudu feels Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) rushed Mayank Yadav back into action in the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

CSK sign Urvil Patel, India's fastest T20 centurion, as injury replacementIPL 2025: Chennai Super Kings signed 26-year-old Gujarat wicketkeeper-batter Urvil Patel as injury replacement for Vansh Bedi on Monday. Urvil had hit a 28-ball hundred in a Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy match last year.

Kagiso Rabada drug test fail: Tim Paine slams lack of transparency around issueTim Paine has slammed the secrecy around Kagiso Rabada's drug test failure and how the pacer was silently allowed to head home to South Africa to serve out his ban. Rabada revealed that he had consumed a recreational drug and was serving a provisional suspension.

Gareth Southgate relives love for cricket in IPL 2025: Used to watch Kapil DevFormer England manager Gareth Southgate, draped in Royals' pink, embraced Jaipur's IPL buzz, reminisced about Kapil and Gavaskar, and praised Rahul Dravid's coaching model—likening it to elite football setups he once helmed.

Prabhsimran Singh's father battling with kidney failure, only smiles when son batsPunjab Kings' (PBKS) batter Prabhsimran Singh's rich form in the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 is serving as the only ray of happiness for his  ailing father suffering from kidney failure.

Liverpool confirm Trent Alexander-Arnold exit amidst Real Madrid interestTrent Alexander-Arnold thanked Liverpool fans as his move away from Anfield was confirmed, with Real Madrid links intensifying ahead of what promises to be a new chapter for the England star in Spain.

No Jasprit Bumrah? 3 vice-captaincy options for India on England tourJasprit Bumrah may not be picked as vice-captain for India's five-match Test series against England later this year. But India can look up to other options to take charge.

India slip to fourth in ICC Test rankings, maintain top spot in ODIs and T20IsThe Indian cricket team slipped to fourth spot in the latest ICC Men's Test team rankings as England rose to second spot to overtake South Africa and Rohit Sharma's men. However, the Men in Blue maintained top spot in both ODIs and T20Is.

Oscar Piastri fights past Max Verstappen to complete hat-trick of winsOscar Piastri beat Max Verstappen in the Miami Grand Prix and also took a 16-point lead over Lando Norris in the Formula One Championship.

IPL qualification scenario: Is Rishabh Pant and LSG's playoffs dream truly alive?Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) suffered their third consecutive loss in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) after being undone by Punjab Kings (PBKS) in Match 54 of the season. However, captain Rishabh Pant is still hopeful of making it to the playoffs.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
